issue.title: [Dev][Release] Merge script should prompt for next version when maintenance branch is created
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17205](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17205). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once the maintenance branch has been created to implement the feature freeze for the release the version prompted on the merge_pr script should be the following release.
